summary: Additional Unicorn re-textured black from Holugar\'s original unicorn mod.
descriptionHtml:
A black unicorn added to the world of Skyrim.  Black Unicorn uses Holugar\'s mesh and re-textured skin. I highly recommend Convenient Horses mod in addition to this, as it allows customization to this basic model for player\'s tastes.

Black Unicorn does not need to be purchased, it comes essential and configured with a standard speed, and should be the player\'s level. 

Location: Riverwood gate if you\'re coming from the beginning area, he is located to the right by the campsite.
author: Stanleyjf1985

files.name: Black Unicorn v2
files.changelogHtml: Changed hard-coded C:\ driven paths in the Unicorn nif to relative paths
